1.text: Beat the butter in a medium-sized mixing bowl until smooth and fluffy.

2.text: Add the powdered sugar a small amount at a time.
2.vid: /8/86/Make Simple Five Minute Frosting Step 2 Version 2.360p.mp4

3.text: Gradually stir in the half-and-half or milk until you have reached your desired consistency.
3.vid: /0/0b/Make Simple Five Minute Frosting Step 3 Version 2.360p.mp4

4.text: Add in the vanilla extract and a pinch of salt and mix well.
4.vid: /a/a9/Make Simple Five Minute Frosting Step 4 Version 2.360p.mp4

5.text: Consider adding a few drops of food coloring.
5.vid: /8/8b/Make Simple Five Minute Frosting Step 5 Version 2.360p.mp4

6.text: Put the butter in a heat-safe bowl and microwave it until it has melted.

7.text: Add in the cocoa powder and mix it.

8.text: Add the milk and vanilla extract.

9.text: Keep mixing while gradually adding in the powdered sugar.

10.text: Pour the powdered sugar into a bowl.

11.text: Add two tablespoons of milk or water.

12.text: Consider adding some extract or food coloring.

13.text: Stir the icing with a fork.

14.text: Add up to four more tablespoons of your chosen liquid.
